front.title: An Anonymity and Unlinkability Extension for OMIPv6

abstract.t: The "Optimized Mobile IPv6 with CBA" (OMIPv6) protocol specifies a new route optimization (RO) mechanism, which offers better security, less signaling messages and reduces the handoff latency. This document describes a new extension to be added to the OMIPv6 protocol in order to provide the anonymity and the unlinkability aspects at the IP layer.
